aicpa-topic.title: Financial Statements to Be Filed With the SEC and Self-Regulatory Organizations and to Be Furnished to Customers of Broker-Dealers

body.p: 3.160 Unless the broker-dealer is exempt under paragraph (c) of Rule 17a-5, it is required to file an audited statement of financial condition and other specified audited statements with the SEC and the self-regulatory organizations of which the broker-dealer is a member on an annual basis. These broker-dealers are also required to provide those audited statements to customers annually.

3.161 The audited statement of financial condition and other audited statements are required to be sent to customers within 105 days after the date of the fiscal year-end or 30 days after that if the broker-dealer includes them in the next quarterly account statement sent by the broker-dealer to customers and if it includes a statement of the broker-dealer’s net capital and its required net capital as of a fiscal month end that is within the 75-day period immediate preceding the date the statements are sent to customers.

3.162 Broker-dealers are also required by the SEC to furnish each customer with an unaudited statement of financial condition dated 6 months after the date of the audited financial statements. The unaudited statement should conform to the audited statement with respect to presentation and disclosure requirements and should be furnished within 65 days of the statement date or 70 days after that if the broker-dealer includes them in the next quarterly account statement sent by the broker-dealer to customers and if it includes a statement of the broker-dealer’s net capital and its required net capital as of a fiscal month end that is within the 75-day period immediately preceding the date the statements are sent to customers.

3.163 In lieu of sending customers the audited and unaudited statements described above, a broker-dealer may send its customers summary information regarding its financial condition, as long as it also provides customers with a toll-free number to call for a free copy of its full statement of financial condition, makes its full statement of financial condition available to customers over the internet on the broker-dealer’s website, and meets other specified requirements.
